languageKey.label: None
Minimum word length:All words shorter than this length will be removed from the speaking URL. Set to 0 to enable all words.
White list:Choose a white list of allowed words. These words will be kept even if too short.
Black list:Choose a black list of forbidden words. These words will be removed even if long enough.
Convert to lowercase:Check this box to convert all titles to lowercase. This is used only if not already defined in the RealURL configuration.
Space character:Enter a character that will replace all blank spaces. This is used only if not already defined in the RealURL configuration.
RealURL related settings
